cyclone.name: DORIAN
cyclone.current_location: about 160 miles SE of Nantucket, Massachusetts
cyclone.trajectory: accelerating northeastward toward Nova Scotia and Newfoundland

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane Watch for Prince Edward Island and the Magdalen Islands (Atlantic Canada)
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning from Lower East Pubnico to Brule, Nova Scotia, and from Indian Harbour to Hawke's Bay, Newfoundland; Tropical-Storm Warning Woods Hole MA to Eastport ME and portions of Atlantic Canada
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Southeastern New England coast, coastal Maine, Nova Scotia, Prince Edward Island, New Brunswick, Newfoundland
weather_observation.wind: No tropical-storm-force winds expected at Port Everglades, FL in the next 5 days
weather_observation.other_hazards: Moderate rip-current risk may linger, but no significant operational hazards from Dorian at Port Everglades
